titre: El Lute II: Tomorrow I'll be Free
resume: This is the story of a man fighting with all his might for his life and his freedom. Eleuterio  embarks upon an action-packed future, fuelled by the notions of freedom and dreams of living just as his countrymen, ever-growing in his mind. Nothing and no-one can stop him. After escaping the Puerto de Santa María prison, the reunion with his family is just the beginning of what will become an endless escape.
